[文档]class CreditCertificateFinancingParentAPIView(GenericViewSet):
    """
    融资-授信凭证的基本信息:
        - get  获取父级凭证基本信息
        - post  新增融资凭证
    """
    # X信 - 融资管理 - 融资审批
    permission_classes = [XLetterFinancingManageApprovePermission]
    serializer_class = CreditCertificateFinancingParentSerializer
    queryset = CreditCertificate.objects.all().order_by('id')
    lookup_url_kwarg = 'ppk'


[文档]    def get_object(self):
        """返回待融资信用凭证（父级凭证）"""
        # 数据集接口
        queryset = self.filter_queryset(self.get_queryset())

        # 通过path参数获取对象
        lookup_url_kwarg = self.lookup_url_kwarg or self.lookup_field
        assert lookup_url_kwarg in self.kwargs, (
            'Expected view %s to be called with a URL keyword argument '
            'named "%s". Fix your URL conf, or set the `.lookup_field` '
            'attribute on the view correctly.' %
            (self.__class__.__name__, lookup_url_kwarg)
        )

        # 登录者企业身份
        company_login = self.request.company
        filter_kwargs = {self.lookup_field: self.kwargs[lookup_url_kwarg], "company": company_login}
        obj = get_object_or_404(queryset, **filter_kwargs)

        # 检查对象权限
        self.check_object_permissions(self.request, obj)

        # 已作废的信用凭证不可转让
        if not obj.is_valid:
            raise NotAcceptable("信用凭证已作废！")

        # 不是正常持有的不可转让
        current_node = obj.creditcurrentnode.work_flow.code
        if not(current_node == "open_hold" or current_node == "transfer_complete"):
            raise NotAcceptable("当前信用凭证不可转让！")

        # 临近付款日不可转让
        today = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        if (obj.promise_pay_at - today).days <= CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT:
            raise NotAcceptable("临近付款日不可转让")

        return obj



[文档]    def retrieve(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """
        get:获取待融资的信用凭证信息
        """
        instance = self.get_object()
        serializer = self.get_serializer(instance)
        return Response(serializer.data)



[文档]    @transaction.atomic
    def create(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """
        post:
            - 新建融资信用凭证
            - 返回融资信用凭证的id
        """
        user_id = request.user.id

        # 校验支付验证码
        phone = request.user.phone
        code = request.data.pop("phone_code", "")
        if not code:
            raise ValidationError("请输入支付验证码！")
        result = validate_pay_code(phone, code)
        if result['status'] != "success":
            return Response(result)

        serializer = CreditCertificateFinancingCreateUpdateSerializer(data=request.data)
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)

        # 融资金额不能大于净额
        parent_cc = self.get_object()
        amount = serializer.validated_data['amount']
        if amount > parent_cc.net_amount:
            raise NotAcceptable(f"融资金额不能大于净额!")

        # 创建融资信用凭证
        business = Business.objects.get(name="financing")
        number = CreditCertificate.generate_financing_number(parent_cc)
        path = CreditCertificate.generate_path(parent_cc)
        financing_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.create(
            review_status="reviewing",  # 信用凭证审核状态改为"审批中：reviewing"
            credit_id=parent_cc.credit.id,
            company_id=parent_cc.credit.capital_company.id,  # 融资机构
            from_company_id=parent_cc.company.id,  # 发起融资的企业
            amount=serializer.validated_data['amount'],
            promise_pay_at=parent_cc.promise_pay_at,
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            number=number,
            business_id=business.id,
            path=path,
        )
        now = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        loan_day = n_days_later(now, LOAN_DAYS_ESTIMATED)  # 预计放款日
        financing_annualized_interest = FinanceProject.get_financing_annualized_interest(financing_cc, loan_day, amount)
        technical_service = FinanceProject.get_technical_service(financing_cc, loan_day, amount)
        information_consultation = FinanceProject.get_information_consultation(financing_cc, loan_day, amount)
        finance_number = FinanceProject.generate_financing_project_number()
        FinanceProject.objects.create(
            credit_certificate=financing_cc,
            finance_number=finance_number,
            financing_annualized_interest_rate=financing_cc.credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate,
            financing_annualized_interest=financing_annualized_interest,
            technical_service_rate=financing_cc.credit.technical_service_rate,
            technical_service=technical_service,
            information_consultation_rate=financing_cc.credit.information_consultation_rate,
            information_consultation=information_consultation,
            punishment_rate=financing_cc.credit.punishment_rate,
        )

        # 当前工作流节点更新为"融资审批:finance_review"
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="finance_review")
        CreditCurrentNode.objects.create(
            credit_certificate_id=financing_cc.id,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        # 创建"融资申请"审核日志
        now = datetime.datetime.now()
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="finance_apply")
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            result="pass",
            opinion="提交融资申请！",
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=now,
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            data_id=financing_cc.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            node=wf.title,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        data = CreditCertificateFinancingCreateUpdateSerializer(financing_cc).data
        return Response(data, status=status.HTTP_201_CREATED)




[文档]class CreditCertificateFinancingRetrieveUpdateDestroyAPIView(RetrieveUpdateDestroyAPIView):
    """
    融资-融资凭证的基本信息:
        - get  获取
        - put  修改
        - delete 作废
    """
    # X信 - 融资管理 - 融资审批
    permission_classes = [XLetterFinancingManageApprovePermission]
    queryset = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(business__name="financing", is_valid=True).order_by('id')
    lookup_url_kwarg = 'fpk'


[文档]    def get_object(self):
        """返回当前转让凭证对象"""
        # 数据集接口
        queryset = self.filter_queryset(self.get_queryset())

        # 通过path参数获取对象
        lookup_url_kwarg = self.lookup_url_kwarg or self.lookup_field
        assert lookup_url_kwarg in self.kwargs, (
            'Expected view %s to be called with a URL keyword argument '
            'named "%s". Fix your URL conf, or set the `.lookup_field` '
            'attribute on the view correctly.' %
            (self.__class__.__name__, lookup_url_kwarg)
        )

        # 登录者企业身份
        company_login = self.request.company
        filter_kwargs = {self.lookup_field: self.kwargs[lookup_url_kwarg], "from_company": company_login}
        obj = get_object_or_404(queryset, **filter_kwargs)

        # 检查对象权限
        self.check_object_permissions(self.request, obj)

        # 已作废的信用凭证不可修改
        if not obj.is_valid:
            raise NotAcceptable("信用凭证已作废！")

        # 审批中和审核通过的不可修改
        if obj.review_status == "reviewing" or obj.review_status == "pass":
            raise NotAcceptable("当前信用凭证不可修改！")

        # 临近付款日不可修改
        today = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        if (obj.promise_pay_at - today).days <= CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT:
            raise NotAcceptable("临近付款日不可修改")

        return obj



[文档]    @transaction.atomic
    def retrieve(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """
        融资申请被驳回后，此时计算父级凭证的净额，应该加上当前融资所占用的净额
        """
        financing_cc = self.get_object()
        serializer = CreditCertificateFinancingRetrieveSerializer(financing_cc)
        data = deepcopy(serializer.data)
        balance_available_update = financing_cc.parent_credit_certificate.net_amount + financing_cc.amount
        data.update({
            "balance_available": FenToYuanFloatField().to_representation(balance_available_update),
        })
        return Response(data)



[文档]    @transaction.atomic
    def update(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        user_id = request.user.id

        # 校验支付验证码
        phone = request.user.phone
        code = request.data.pop("phone_code", "")
        if not code:
            raise ValidationError("请输入支付验证码！")
        result = validate_pay_code(phone, code)
        if result['status'] != "success":
            return Response(result)

        serializer = CreditCertificateFinancingCreateUpdateSerializer(data=request.data)
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)

        # 转让金额不能大于净额
        financing_cc = self.get_object()
        parent_cc = financing_cc.parent_credit_certificate
        amount_old = parent_cc.amount  # 修改前的转让金额（创建中的转让金额，不占用可转金额）
        available_quota = parent_cc.net_amount if financing_cc.review_status == "creating" else financing_cc.net_amount + amount_old
        amount = serializer.validated_data['amount']  # 修改后的转让金额
        if amount > available_quota:
            raise NotAcceptable(f"融资金额不能大于净额!")

        # 更新转让信用凭证
        CreditCertificate.objects.filter(pk=financing_cc.id).update(
            review_status="reviewing",
            amount=serializer.validated_data['amount'],
            s1_user_id=user_id,
        )
        now = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        loan_day = n_days_later(now, LOAN_DAYS_ESTIMATED)  # 预计放款日
        financing_annualized_interest = FinanceProject.get_financing_annualized_interest(financing_cc, loan_day, amount)
        technical_service = FinanceProject.get_technical_service(financing_cc, loan_day, amount)
        information_consultation = FinanceProject.get_information_consultation(financing_cc, loan_day, amount)
        financing_project = financing_cc.financeproject
        financing_project.financing_annualized_interest = financing_annualized_interest
        financing_project.technical_service = technical_service
        financing_project.information_consultation = information_consultation
        financing_project.save()

        # 当前工作流节点更新为"融资审批:finance_review"
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="finance_review")
        current_node = financing_cc.creditcurrentnode
        current_node.work_flow = wf
        current_node.save()

        # 创建"融资申请"审核日志
        now = datetime.datetime.now()
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="finance_apply")
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            result="pass",
            opinion="提交融资申请！",
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=now,
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            data_id=financing_cc.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            node=wf.title,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        # 注意：当前的transfer_cc对象是旧对象，与最新数据库里更新的对象属性数据不一致,如果需要最新数据需要刷新对象
        # financing_cc.refresh_from_db()
        data = CreditCertificateFinancingCreateUpdateSerializer(financing_cc).data
        return Response(data)



[文档]    def perform_destroy(self, instance):
        instance.is_valid = False
        instance.save()
